name: Null Void
description:
Null Void is a simple platformer made for Ludum Dare 37: One Room

Space Cadet Null is undergoing training in the Void, a holodeck designed to make efficient use of space. As Null completes objectives, the Void reconstructs the room around him to create new obstacles.

CONTROLS:
ARROW KEYS to Move
X to Jump
1,2,3 to select difficulty
M to mute music

TOOLS:
Eclipse
Paint.net
BFXR.net
Audacity
online.boscaceoil.net

BUG FIXES:
Made health get restored when restarting the game
Fixed unintended skip in level 17
Fixed compatibility issue
Fixed infinite lives mode having limited lives
Made enemies despawn when off screen
